dishes.title: Dishes
dishes.description: Turning tomatoes into tuna, cashews into stretchy mozzarella, and banana peels into pulled “pork” is a creative culinary challenge that many vegans love to take on.

options.title: Fried Tofu
options.description: Fried chicken style tofu served with zucchini pasta.

options.title: Pumpkin Soup
options.description: Creamy pumpkin soup served with minced meat style tofu.

options.title: Strawberry Salad
options.description: A refreshingly and delightfully strawberry salad.

drinks.title: Drinks
drinks.description: We know how to transform veggies and fruits into something different. Here,  people can enjoy a meal that more closely resembles what others might be eating.

options.title: Mint-Cucumber Lemonade
options.description: Great to relax after a log day working

options.title: Fruit Infused Water
options.description: Your water doesn't have to be boring! It's so delicious, you won't even realize it's healthy.

options.title: Ginger Beer Mojito
options.description: But back up, you say. Ginger beer? In mojitos? Heck to the yes, We say.

options.title: Summer Breeze Cocktail
options.description: If you like Tequila Sunrises you'll love this cocktail with a summer twist!
